data.name: Executive Operation Failed
data.description: At +3.7s the executive reports the operation failed (error.code = 2, error.message = 'Behavior Tree failed execution'). The /proto/executive_operation_state topic shows a transition from RUNNING to FAILED state. Simultaneously, the /diagnostics topic reports multiple subsystem errors including navigation timeout and sensor degradation. This failure correlates with the robot attempting a complex manipulation task while the battery level dropped below 15% as shown in /battery_state.

data.name: Recovery Attempt Initiated
data.description: Following the previous failure, the system initiated an automatic recovery sequence. The /proto/executive_operation_state shows a transition to RECOVERING state at +10.0s. The recovery manager published a new plan on /recovery_plan with strategy 'RETRY_WITH_REDUCED_CONSTRAINTS'. During this interval, the robot moved to a safe position as evidenced by velocity commands on /cmd_vel dropping to near-zero values.
